plain: I can infer that the user's favourite genre is drama, as many of the movies listed fall into that category. The user's favourite visual style is likely to be realistic, as many of the movies listed are based on real events or have a documentary feel. The user's favourite writing style is likely to be character-driven, as many of the movies listed focus on the development of complex characters. The user's favourite runtime is likely to be around two hours, as many of the movies listed are of that length. The user's favourite themes are likely to be social issues, as many of the movies listed deal with topics such as racism, violence, and corruption.
